description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability identified as CVE-2023-36006, apply the relevant updates available for your system:

1. Visit the Microsoft Update Catalog at the links provided below.
2. Download and install the appropriate KB updates for your system's build number:
   - For Windows 10 x64-based Systems: KB5033379, KB5033373, KB5033372.
   - For Windows 11 x64-based Systems: KB5033383, KB5033373, KB5033375, KB5033369.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The updates relate to vulnerabilities in the WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server and are critical for maintaining system integrity and security.
- Ensure the system is connected to the internet for the smooth download of updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Verify your system’s build number before selecting the appropriate updates.
- Backup important data before proceeding with the update installation.

**Update Packages**:
- [KB5033118](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033118)
- [KB5033422](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033422)
- [KB5033373](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033373)
- [KB5033379](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033379)
- [KB5033375](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033375)
- [KB5033369](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033369)
- [KB5033429](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033429)
- [KB5033433](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033433)
- [KB5033420](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033420)
- [KB5033383](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033383)
- [KB5033372](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033372)
